## Exercise One
Try to complete the following:

1. Read in the first five participants (p01 - p05).
    a) Drop/remove the following variables: `TrackerDistance`, `SedentaryDistance`, and `Calories`.
    b) Set variables in the appropriate format(s).
2.  Read in the demographics file and set appropriate variables as factors.
    a) Drop/remove the following variables: `Ethnicity` and `Education`.
3. Read in the goals file.
